    • Method Detail

      • updatePositions

        public void updatePositions(float x,
                            float y,
                            long timestamp)
        Update the position of each particle in the system using the Verlet integrator. The Verlet algorithm is a method for the numerical solution of Newton's equations of motion. Check if one of the balls displayed on the screen met the circle - if so, remove them
        Parameters:
        x - the new x position of the ball
        y - the new y position of the ball
        timestamp - the current timestamp

      • update

        public void update(float x,
                   float y,
                   long timestamp)
        Performs one iteration of the simulation. First updating the position of all the particles and resolving the constraints and collisions.
        Parameters:
        x - the new x position of the ball
        y - the new y position of the ball
        timestamp - the current timestamp
